1406320.name: Fantasy Grounds - Orcs & Ogres
1406320.description:
Orcs & Ogres

A pack filled with ogres and orcs for your games.

This product includes:
  • High_Ogre_greasword
  • High_Ogre_greataxe
  • High_Ogre_Machetes
  • Ogre_Armor_Greataxe
  • Ogre_Armor_Greataxe02
  • Ogre_Armor_Greatclub
  • Ogre_Armor_Greatclub02
  • Ogre_Armor_GreatSword
  • Ogre_Armor_GreatSword02
  • Ogre_Greataxe
  • Ogre_GreatClub
  • Ogre_GreatClub2
  • Ogre_Magi_Greataxe
  • Ogre_Magi_Greatsword
  • Ogre_Magi_Kanabo
  • Ogre_Magi_Katana
  • Ogre_Magi_Naginata
  • Ogre_Magi_Yumi
  • Ogress_Cleaver
  • Ogress_Club
  • OgressMagi_Greatsword
  • OgressMagi_Kanabo
  • OgressMagi_Katana
  • OgressMagi_Yumi
  • Orc_Archer_Arrow
  • Orc_Archer_FlamingArrow
  • Orc_Archer_FlamingYumi
  • Orc_Archer_Yumi
  • Orc_Heavy_Axe
  • Orc_Heavy_Cleaver
  • Orc_Heavy_DualCleaver
  • Orc_Heavy_Shieldbasher
  • Orc_Heavy_Spear
  • Orc_Raider_Cleaver
  • Orc_Raider_Falchion
  • Orc_Raider_Greataxe
  • Orc_Raider_Maul
  • Orc_Samurai_Dual
  • Orc_Samurai_Longblade
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
